title: Thank You
lyrics: My tea's gone cold, I'm wondering why I got out of bed at all. The morning rain clouds up my window and I can't see at all. And even if I could it'd all be grey, but your picture on my wall. It reminds me that it's Not so bad, it's not so bad I want to thank you for giving me the best day of my life. Oh just to be with you is having the best day of my life Push the door, I'm home at last and I'm soaking through and through. Then you hand me a towel and all I see is you. And even if my house falls down, I wouldn't have a clue. Because you're near me and
